channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: A shipping container is sitting on the pavement, 9th December
item.description:
Shipping container is completely blocking the pavement. There are no official signs or notices, so it appears to be illegally placed and is causing an obstruction.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Haymerle Road, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollard and section of pavement torn out., 9th December
item.description:
Directly in front of Block 7 Mackintosh Lane a car crashed into the bollard, ripping it out alongside a whole section of pavement. It needs to be repaired urgently as it is a trip hazard and very unsafe. Also those bollards protect the residents.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mackintosh Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped furniture on Cross Road, 9th December
item.description:
A broke. baby crib has been dumped on Cross Road. Been here several weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cross Road, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ponding on road and path affecting pedestrians, 9th December
item.description:
Since the road was resurfaced this year the water no longer drains to to nearest drain and ponds badly. As a result it splashes up onto the path. The path also is uneven and dosnt flow into the drain creating large ponding on the path. Please can both be resolved?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lownds Court, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unattended Council Rubbish Bin to the rtight of 1 Cumberland Ave - rubbish being put in buin but not colleected by dustmen, 9th December
item.description:
A 'spare' standard Bexley Council rubbish bin has been left at the top of Cumberland Avenue for several weeks, conitnulally being moved, and now being filled-up with rubbish by pedestrians, but as it isn't allocated to house, the binmen are ignoring - the rubbish will become a health hazard if not emptied soon, so please arrange for this bin to be emptied and then collected ASAP as it seems to be spare/unallocated to a house
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cumberland Avenue, Falconwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter northbound M11, 9th December
item.description:
There is a significant amount of letter on the verges that the M11 prior to junction 5 northbound so much litter it looks like it's falling off the back of a truck please clean it up
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M11, Chigwell, Epping Forest
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Same problem every year muddy and wet, 9th December
item.description:
